des: "Can be used with mixed greens, chicken salad, salmon and sliced tomatoes.  My family rated it 9 out of 10.  Hope yours will too!"
ins: In a blender or food processor, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, chives, green onion, garlic, vinegar, tarragon, sugar and Worcestershire sauce and blend until smooth.  Season to taste with salt and pepper.  Cover and refrigerate until serving.  It will keep up to three days in the refrigerator.
